summary.Title: Museum Sales Assistant - Part Time
summary.Presentation: Fancy a job amongst shrunken heads, tall men, fairy tales and spooky surprises? Then you may be our new colleague in the most unusual workplace in Copenhagen!Your new job is ab

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Fancy a job amongst shrunken heads, tall men, fairy tales and spooky surprises? Then you may be our new colleague in the most unusual workplace in Copenhagen!

Your new job is about selling tickets and souvenirs, keeping the attractions clean and in good condition, light cleaning and other assignments.

Your qualifications

  • Minimum 2 years experience with costumer service from retail
  • Experience with POS and credit card terminals
  • A friendly and very outgoing personality
  • A proactive, ‘can-do’ attitude 
  • Must speak and write English. Danish and other languages are an advantage


You will work at Ripley’s Believe It or Not! and Hans Christian Andersen Experience on Rådhuspladsen and Guinness World Records and The Mystic Exploratorium on Strøget. The position is part time with around 4 shifts per week. You must be able to work 7 days a week, holidays and weekends. We also expect candidates be fully available from 13th June until the end of August for the high season.
In return we offer the weirdest place to work in Copenhagen, cool and diverse co-workers and a generous bonus system. Got your attention?

Please email a Cover Letter, CV and references to sousa@ripleys.com.
